name: Elementis
description:
Elementis

Made in a week for Easy Jam (8 Bits to Infinity)  for which the theme was No enemies. Made in Unity 2019.2.17f1.

How to play

The goal of the game is to make the entire board the same color.
You start controlling the top left corner square.
You then press the colored buttons across the bottom to change the color of the squares you control.
As you make your pieces touch pieces of the same color, you acquire them.
